author: Tejas Mangi
text:
When was the last time India witnessed so much attention from world leaders amidst an event of global concern?

Clearly an indication of the place of importance and influence we occupy in the world order. This is #NewIndia,#Narendramodi 's fabulous foreign policies and relations

author: Tejas Mangi
text:
Between 19 March and 1 April these global leaders visited India
Japan-PM
Australia-PM(virtual)
USA-Undersecretary
Austria, Greece, Oman, China, Mexico-Foreign ministers
EU - Special envoy
Germany - NSA
UK-Foreign secretary
USA - Dy. NSA
Russia - Foreign minister

1/2
